title: Building a Personal Portfolio with MERN Stack
author: Alice Johnson
excerpt: Learn how to create a personal portfolio website using the MERN stack, showcasing your skills and projects.
content: In this blog post, we will go step-by-step to build a responsive portfolio website using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js. We'll cover user authentication, project display, and much more.

title: Best Practices for Designing Portfolio Websites
author: John Smith
excerpt: Explore the best practices for designing an engaging and effective portfolio website that stands out.
content: A great portfolio website not only showcases your work but also tells your story. This article provides tips on layout, color schemes, and content organization to enhance user experience.

title: How to Showcase Your Projects Effectively
author: Jane Doe
excerpt: Tips and techniques to present your projects in a way that grabs the attention of potential employers or clients.
content: Effective project presentation is key to impressing viewers. This post discusses how to write compelling project descriptions, use visuals effectively, and create a narrative around your work.

title: Integrating Social Media into Your Portfolio
author: Mark Thompson
excerpt: Learn how to link your social media accounts to your portfolio for better visibility and networking.
content: Integrating social media into your portfolio can significantly boost your visibility. This blog post covers how to strategically link your accounts and showcase your professional presence online.

title: Creating an SEO-Friendly Portfolio Website
author: Lisa Brown
excerpt: Discover how to optimize your portfolio website for search engines to attract more visitors.
content: SEO is crucial for your portfolio's visibility. In this article, we will discuss best practices for on-page SEO, including keyword research, meta tags, and optimizing images.
